    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">

    </h2>
    <div class="row">

    <div id="pp_main_image_1" class="smart-image">

    <img id="pp_main_image_2" class="A-IMAGE-RW-ALL smart-image-img" role="img" src="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/images/credit-cards/apple-pay.gif" alt="The image for Pay with your HSBC Credit Card and ATM Card using Apple Pay">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_1" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Now you can enjoy all the benefits of your HSBC credit card and ATM card (with UnionPay logo) with Apple Pay on iPhone, Apple Watch and iPad<sup style="font-family: "HSBC Univers Next Regular", Arial, "PingFang SC", "Microsoft YaHei", "Lantinghei SC", "Heiti SC", simhei, sans-serif; font-variant-ligatures: inherit; font-variant-caps: inherit; background-color: transparent;"><a href="#1">1</a></sup>. It’s the easy, secure, and private way to pay.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Just add your card to Apple Pay and you are ready to make payments at thousands of stores with contactless payment terminals or via participating apps.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Benefits</strong></p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Apple Pay is simple and it works with the devices you use every day</li> 
 <li>Apple Pay is safe as only you can make payments from your device given every payment requires Touch ID or a passcode on iPhone and iPad; and your Apple Watch must be unlocked</li> 
 <li>Apple Pay is secure because your card information isn’t stored on your device or shared when you pay</li> 
 <li>You can easily manage your Apple Pay transactions. Your last 10 transactions are available in your device<sup><a href="#2">2</a></sup> and all transactions will be grouped on your statement with clear indication of “APPLE PAY”</li> 
 <li>You can continue to enjoy all the benefits and rewards from your HSBC credit card</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_11" class="remove-bottom-space A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Setting up is simple</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For all HSBC Visa and MasterCard Credit Cards, please log on to the HSBC HK App and follow the below instructions to add them to Apple Pay:</p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Select the credit card you want to add</li> 
 <li>Select "View more" and then "Manage credit cards"</li> 
 <li>Select the "Add to Apple Wallet" banner to start the process</li> 
 <li>Agree to the disclaimer and select "Get verification code"</li> 
 <li>Input the OTP SMS and confirm</li> 
</ol> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To add your HSBC UnionPay Credit Card to Apple Pay, please follow the instructions below:</p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Open your Apple wallet App</li> 
 <li>Tap the "+" sign in the upper right corner</li> 
 <li>Select "debit or credit card"</li> 
 <li>Select “Add a Different Card”</li> 
 <li>Follow the on-screen instructions and enter your card details</li> 
 <li>Complete verification by calling our contact centre number</li> 
</ol>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_12" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>More Information:</strong></p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>You can add up to eight<sup><a href="#3"><span aria-hidden="true">3</span><span class="visuallyhidden">3 View footnote 3</span></a></sup> cards in a device and the same card can be added up to nine devices.</li> 
 <li>The first card you added will become your default card. Payment will be made from this card unless another card is selected. You can change your default card anytime by going to Settings> Wallet & Apple Pay</li>

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_9">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="pp_main_columnControlColumn_17" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_13" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>An easier way to pay</strong><br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Payment will be made from the default card unless another card is selected.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Paying in stores</strong><br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can use Apple Pay in any stores equipped with Visa payWave, Mastercard contactless or UnionPay QuickPass payment terminals*.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To pay in stores, you are not required to wake your iPhone or open an app. Just hold iPhone near the contactless terminal with your finger on Touch ID. You’ll see “Done” on the display, along with a subtle vibration and beep, letting you know your payment information was sent. If you prefer to use a different card, you can select the card after you hold the iPhone near to the contactless terminal.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">On Apple Watch, double-click the side button, select the card you would like to pay with and hold the display of your Apple Watch up to the contactless reader. A gentle tap and beep confirm that your payment information was sent.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Paying within apps</strong><br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can use Apple Pay within participating apps.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To pay within apps on iPhone and iPad, select Apple Pay as the payment method during checkout and place your finger on Touch ID.<br>  </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For ATM Card, every in-store and in-app payment requires unlocking of the device and payment authentication with your linked ATM Card PIN. </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">*Please refer to Visa/MasterCard/UnionPay webpage for the latest list of contactless payment merchants.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong><a href="https://www.visa.com.hk/en_HK/pay-with-visa/featured-technologies/visa-contactless-payments.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Visa</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Visa Opens up to a new webpage This link will open in a new window</span></a></strong><br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"><strong><a href="http://www.mastercard.com/hk/consumer/contactless-locator.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Mastercard</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Mastercard Opens up to a new webpage This link will open in a new window</span></a></strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"><strong><a href="http://www.unionpayintl.com/en/enproducts/eninnovative/enquickpass/index.shtml" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">UnionPay</span><span class="visuallyhidden">UnionPay Opens up to a new webpage This link will open in a new window</span></a></strong></p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="167495455__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="167495455__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Add your credit card to Apple Pay </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="167495455__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_14">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-75-25  ">
        
        <div id="pp_main_columnControlColumn_26" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_22" class="remove-bottom-space A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Setting up is simple</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For all HSBC Visa and MasterCard Credit Cards, please log on to the HSBC HK App and follow the below instructions to add them to Apple Pay:</p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Select the credit card you want to add</li> 
 <li>Select "View more" and then "Manage credit cards"</li> 
 <li>Select the "Add to Apple Wallet" banner to start the process</li> 
 <li>Agree to the disclaimer and select "Get verification code"</li> 
 <li>Input the OTP SMS and confirm</li> 
</ol> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To add your HSBC UnionPay Credit Card to Apple Pay, please follow the instructions below:</p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Open your Apple wallet App</li> 
 <li>Tap the "+" sign in the upper right corner</li> 
 <li>Select "debit or credit card"</li> 
 <li>Select “Add a Different Card”</li> 
 <li>Follow the on-screen instructions and enter your card details</li> 
 <li>Complete verification by calling our contact centre number</li> 
</ol>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    
        
        <div id="pp_main_columnControlColumn_27" class="cc-column">

            <span class="visuallyhidden">This link will open in a new window</span>
            <figure class="smart-image-content smart-image-figure">
                
    
    
    <picture id="pp_main_image_25">

 <li>You can add up to eight<sup><a href="#3"><span aria-hidden="true">3</span><span class="visuallyhidden">3 View footnote 3</span></a></sup> cards in a device and the same card can be added up to nine devices.</li> 
 <li>The first card you added will become your default card. Payment will be made from this card unless another card is selected. You can change your default card anytime by going to Settings> Wallet & Apple Pay</li>

    <div class="sm-12" data-heading-level="h3">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="tab_1739886194"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="984787266__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="984787266__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Pay with Apple Pay </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="984787266__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_16">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="pp_main_columnControlColumn_29" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_24" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>An easier way to pay</strong><br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Payment will be made from the default card unless another card is selected.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Paying in stores</strong><br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can use Apple Pay in any stores equipped with Visa payWave, Mastercard contactless or UnionPay QuickPass payment terminals*.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To pay in stores, you are not required to wake your iPhone or open an app. Just hold iPhone near the contactless terminal with your finger on Touch ID. You’ll see “Done” on the display, along with a subtle vibration and beep, letting you know your payment information was sent. If you prefer to use a different card, you can select the card after you hold the iPhone near to the contactless terminal.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">On Apple Watch, double-click the side button, select the card you would like to pay with and hold the display of your Apple Watch up to the contactless reader. A gentle tap and beep confirm that your payment information was sent.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Paying within apps</strong><br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can use Apple Pay within participating apps.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To pay within apps on iPhone and iPad, select Apple Pay as the payment method during checkout and place your finger on Touch ID.<br>  </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For ATM Card, every in-store and in-app payment requires unlocking of the device and payment authentication with your linked ATM Card PIN. </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">*Please refer to Visa/MasterCard/UnionPay webpage for the latest list of contactless payment merchants.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong><a href="https://www.visa.com.hk/en_HK/pay-with-visa/featured-technologies/visa-contactless-payments.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Visa</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Visa Opens up to a new webpage This link will open in a new window</span></a></strong><br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"><strong><a href="http://www.mastercard.com/hk/consumer/contactless-locator.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Mastercard</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Mastercard Opens up to a new webpage This link will open in a new window</span></a></strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"><strong><a href="http://www.unionpayintl.com/en/enproducts/eninnovative/enquickpass/index.shtml" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">UnionPay</span><span class="visuallyhidden">UnionPay Opens up to a new webpage This link will open in a new window</span></a></strong></p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
